Service Details: - Works to improve queer, trans, and Two-Spirit lives- Provides a safer space for LGBTQ/2S people and their allies to fully self-express while feeling welcome and included- Offers free counselling, information and referrals, access to gender-affirming chestwear, youth one-to-one support, peer-facilitated support and social groups, special events, volunteer and practicum opportunities, queer competency workshops, educational resources and advisory and consulting services
Address & Map: 1170 Bute StVancouver, BC     V6E 1Z6View MapQuest Map
